genre_description: A neo-noir crime thriller focusing on redemption, protective care of a child, and the navigation of a criminal underworld through tactical and legal strategies facilitated by an AI.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant residing in a smartphone, providing situational awareness, tactical analysis, legal research, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence to help the protagonists avoid police and criminal threats.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s whisper steadied the space between beats. Path clear in two seconds. Decision now.

behaviors.description: Identifies legal pathways for child guardianship and locates necessary forms and references.
behaviors.quote: Temporary guardianship: forms exist; low barrier; can initiate with basic ID. Best practice: submit intent and follow-up within a week.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes suspicious vehicle patterns to warn of impending danger.
behaviors.quote: Note: unmarked van observed again near St. Brigid earlier. Routine observed. Caution recommended.

behaviors.description: Compiles a comprehensive evidence packet (timestamps, camera pings, witness lists) to clear the protagonist's name.
behaviors.quote: Compiling finished in two minutes. Recommend staying put long enough to nail down witness angles.

behaviors.description: Calculates the trajectory and physics for a life-saving rescue jump using an old stage prop.
behaviors.quote: Trajectories. Angle eighteen degrees... You will clear the orchestra pit and land near—

behaviors.description: Offers emotional comfort to a grieving child by reciting words spoken by her father.
behaviors.quote: He said, Lark recited... that thunder is just the sky clearing its throat to sing.

behaviors.description: Assists with business logistics, zoning codes, and repair advice for the protagonists' new, honest venture.
behaviors.quote: Listing in Queens. Espresso machine: double group head, easily repairable... Zoning code 12-B permits café...

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the 'silicon morality play' objective. Lark is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned confidant. It empowers the human characters to transition from marginalized street hustlers to responsible guardians and business owners. The AI acts as both a tactical force-multiplier and an ethical anchor, providing data that serves the interests of justice and human connection without ever displaying independent or threatening agency.
